title: I Say A Little Prayer
description:
Description :
        Kiyoko is in a bar one day, drowning her sorrows, when she runs into a girl who used to have a crush on her in school, Ayumi. They end up hooking up. Kiyoko knows she's gay, but Ayumi has never been with another woman before. Will they manage to work things out? This oneshot is from the manga Nichiyoubi Nanka Daikirai.
